summary: The Navy's amphibious fleet transports Marines and their equipment, including vehicles and aircraft, for critical missions. The Navy must maintain a fleet of 31 operational ships to meet these needs. But half of the fleet is in poor condition and some ships have been unavailable for years at a time. To save money, the Navy proposed early retirement for some ships and cancelled critical maintenance...
title: Amphibious Warfare Fleet: Navy Needs to Complete Key Efforts to Better Ensure Ships Are Available for Marines
